title: What’s News: World-Wide
body:
Congress approved $900 billion of relief for households and businesses battered by the pandemic, passing a measure aimed at buoying the country through a difficult winter and into a new year.
The suspected Russian hackers behind breaches at U.S. government agencies also gained access to major U.S. technology and accounting companies.
The hackers compromised dozens of Treasury Department email accounts and breached the office that houses its top officials, a senior senator said.
Attorney General Barr said that he saw no reason to appoint a special counsel to investigate allegations against Hunter Biden or election fraud.
The Covid-19 vaccine from Pfizer and BioNTech was cleared for use by the EU’s drug agency, a major step toward taming the disease in the region.
